stripped_text: While the Runner has fewer than 6 credits, Bryan Stinson gains "click: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
text: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
title: Bryan Stinson
